The document grants the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy significant authority in shaping drug policy and related national security programs. It also touches on budgetary matters, giving the Director influence over agency budget requests related to drug control. The document doesn't explicitly address immigration, civil liberties, or social inclusion. It leans towards federal control and intervention in addressing drug-related issues.
